Class WgTextRect

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.utils.wysiwyg.WgRectangle
us.mn.state.dot.tms.utils.wysiwyg.WgTextRect
public class WgTextRect extends WgRectangle
Class for GUI operations with text rectangles in the WYSIWYG DMS Message Editor. Not to be confused with the text rectangle MULTI tag token WtTextRectangle.
Author:
Gordon Parikh - SRF Consulting

  • Field Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • WgTextRect

      public WgTextRect(WtTextRectangle trTok)

  • Method Details

    • addToken

      public void addToken(WToken tok)
      Add a token contained within this text rectangle.

    • getTextRectToken

      public WtTextRectangle getTextRectToken()
      Return the text rectangle tag associated with this text rectangle. If null, the text rectangle is the entire sign (as per NTCIP 1203).

    • getLastToken

      public WToken getLastToken()
      Return the last token associated with this text rectangle, either the text rectangle token itself or the last token inside of it. If this is the whole-sign text rectangle, null is returned.
      Overrides:
      getLastToken in class WgRectangle

    • getTokenList

      public WTokenList getTokenList()
      Return the list of tokens inside this text rectangle.

    • isWholeSign

      public boolean isWholeSign()
      Return whether or not the text rectangle is the implicit "whole-sign" text rectangle.

    • findClosestTextToken

      public WToken findClosestTextToken(WPoint p, boolean includeNonPrint)
      Return the closest text token to the point sx, sy (sign coordinates). If includeNonPrint is false, only printable text characters (including spaces and newlines) are included, otherwise all tokens that aren't text/color rectangles or graphics are included.

    • findClosestTokenOfType

      public WToken findClosestTokenOfType(WPoint p, WTokenType tokType)
